name: KARATE++
description:
Karate++ is a rhythm-driven version of International Karate+

It's a super twitchy 2-button score attack / combo game where you have to punch/kick a never ending stream of baddies in time to the (kinda procedural) music.

Miss a punch and it's instant death. Buttonmash and you'll lose your combo.

This is kind of an early proof of concept for a bigger project, with more moves and enemy types, but there's plenty here to master (The spawn patterns of the enemies gets increasingly hard up to a score of 10,000,000, after that it tops out).

This project uses character sprites derived from IK+ on the Atari520ST.
